channel.title: Cash cape
channel.description:
[quote="time of rune"]Thx for the credit 70% credit me 20% credit to silent cj for the cape help tut 5% to Varnisher150 for tut and 5% to Ak226688 for putting on his client :)[/quote]
[IMG]http://i727.photobucket.com/albums/ww274/ak268/11111111111111111111.jpg[/img]
he did also give me permission for me to post on mopar :)

item.title: Cash cape
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:7, topic:274960”]You know the objective of my tutorial was not to create lots of skillcapes, each with a different icon, it was intended so you could use your own common sense and initiative to create your own models using a 2d image but developing it into a 3d model.
It seems you didn’t get the message.[/quote]

thats what teh tut was for, and i didnt mean the whole cape, i meant the $, u need to colour both sides of it and it shouldnt look all clippy and for the ints, just zoom it out a bit, look at other ints, compare, its quite easy if u just look at a diff pair of Ints that already have listed what class.8# does

Read full topic

item.title: Cash cape
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

the1337legend:

erm… not ur cape?.. dont post work thats not urs then?.. nd yh the Ints fail, the symbol isnt done properly(wasnt coloured on the back or front w.e way is in the cape cause its see through), nd the colours rnt too good, and also l0l, the tut suggested the cash symbol as an example, try using a different symbol, different idea, and possibly a diff cape design o.0

Okay, i gave ak permission to put this on mopar, this is my 1ST TIME EVER making ints, i still have editing to do on the color and $ design, how is the cape see-through, and the whole point of the cape was to folow silent cj’s tut…

Read full topic

item.title: Cash cape
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:6, topic:274960”][quote author=TeleNubby link=topic=363261.msg2759593#msg2759593 date=1240442330]
No offence or anything… but that looks horrid. BOTH the actual model and the inventory icon.
[/quote]
lol tell what you think about mine>.>
ontopic there not to bad I mean there in game :D[/quote]
OK imma be brutally honest here. recolored skillcapes with an added symbol is uncreative and stupid as hell. everytime i see one it annoys me. IT TAKES NO TALENTAND SUCKS. cmon everyone, no more skillcapes already.

Read full topic

item.title: Cash cape

@SilentCJ wrote:

You know the objective of my tutorial was not to create lots of skillcapes, each with a different icon, it was intended so you could use your own common sense and initiative to create your own models using a 2d image but developing it into a 3d model.
It seems you didn’t get the message.
